thread.section_title: Bikes2udirect Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bikes2udirect | www.bikes2udirect.com
thread.title: John B

author: John B
title: John B
text:
Wanted a cycle for my daughter. Eventually plumped for bikes direct 2u. Ordered the cycle and requested a particular delivery day. Was initially a little concerned after reading some poor reviews online. But I am pleased to say the cycle arrived on the day I requested it. The packaging was a bit battered but the cycle was fine. 2 small points - a bolt was missing off the rack which I replaced and the front wicker basket was damaged.
Emailed customer services. Prompt email reply and a new basket delivered a few days later.
So far so good and no problems with the cycle.
